page_content:
AMR Corporation     Environmental Responsibility Report 1
Committed to Preserving the Wonders of Our World
“We Know Why You Fly.” Our current ad campaign recognizes the reasons you take to the skies. 
This Environmental Responsibility Report is really about the same thing. You fly to see the wonders 
our world has to offer: its vistas, its cultures, its life. Reducing our environmental footprint is 
central to making sure those wonders are there for generations to come.(	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (	 (
